main.server

Class ServerGameThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.server.ServerGameThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerGameThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class for checking moves sent by clients and making those moves on the server side model of the board.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dr√© van Oorschot, Andrei Raureanu

      • determineTurn

        public ClientThread determineTurn()
        Determines whose players turn it is.
        Returns:
        player whose turn it is

      • makeMove

        public java.lang.Integer[] makeMove(ClientThread ct)
                             throws IllegalMoveException,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                    PlayerDisconnectException
        Takes the move from the clients move buffer and checks whether the move is valid. When valid the move will be made on the board. The method returns coordinates of the move, which can later be sent to other clients so that they in order can update their board models to the current state of the game.
        Parameters:
        ct - player for who the move should be checked and made
        Returns:
        coordinates of the move
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        PlayerDisconnectException

      • getWinner

        public ClientThread getWinner()
                       throws InternalErrorException
        Checks whether a player has won by checking their mark in the board for a win condition.
        Returns:
        player that has won the game
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - Thrown when there is no winner (e.g. in case of a draw)

      • getPlayerAmount

        public int getPlayerAmount()
        Returns the amount of players participating in the game.
        Returns:
        number of players in the game

      • getTurn

        public int getTurn()
        Returns the turn number between 0 and the amount of players - 1. Every number corresponds to a player.
        Returns:
        number between 0 and the amount of players - 1

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()

        the board of the game

      • isDisconnect

        public boolean isDisconnect()
        Returns whether a player in this game has disconnected.
        Returns:
        true if a player disconnected, false if players of this game are still connected

      • getDisconnectedThread

        public ClientThread getDisconnectedThread()
        In case of a disconnection, returns the player that disconnected.
        Returns:
        disconnected player or null if there isn't one

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the game with all players participating.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Thread
        Returns:
        String with player names of the players participating preceded by the word "game".

      • setDisconnect

        public void setDisconnect(boolean disc,
                          ClientThread ct)
        In case of a disconnection, sets disconnect to true and disconnectedThread to the player who has disconnected.
        Parameters:

        ct - player that disconnected
